item.description:
Mark your calendars now for our annual Holiday Gathering, Wednesday December 7th at Apollo Grill in Easthampton.  We've enjoyed  wonderful gatherings at Apollo over the years and are happy to be returning for more great food and interesting company.  This is a low-key way to get to know WBOA Members outside our regular meetings.  Please feel free to bring a friend or colleague.
 
Our three-course dinner will include a fresh green salad, choice of entrees and a delicious dessert. Total price including tax and tip will be $27.  Cash bar.  Informal networking begins at 5:30, dinner at 6:30.
 
Please RSVP by December 4.  If you have any questions, please contact our social coordinator Amy Woolf at amysrq@gmail.com.
 
Choice of salad:
· Mixed Greens with Julienne Vegetables
· Caesar Salad


Choice of entree:
· Eggplant Napoleon with Basil Oil, Fresh Mozzarella, Roasted Tomato, Portabella and Garlicky Spinach
· Pan Roasted Chicken with Herb Jus, Mushroom Risotto with Leeks and Carrots
· Cornmeal-crusted Catfish with Lemon Caper Butter Sauce, Grilled Asparagus and Parsley Mashed Potatoes
· Grilled Hanger Steak with Burgundy Demi-glaze, Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Butternut Squash, Twice-baked Potato with Bacon and Cheddar
 
Choice of dessert:
· Chocolate Hazelnut Mousse
· Apple Wontons with Vanilla Ice Cream
item.name: Holiday Evening Social Event
